void lgTag::setLastInRange (  lgEvent *  ev  ) 
 

lgTag * lgTag::splitRange (  lgFactory *  factory  ) 
 

split into \...begin \...end if tag has a range, and return NULL or new tag to be inserted

split (..) ranges into ranges if the lastInRange and prevEv events are located in different voices (should never happen) the \...end should be placed in the voice of lastInRange!
